plot: During military exercise four cadets and their leader face a group of profiteers robbing battlefields of WWII. The profiteers capture their leader, the cadets go into action and neutralize the criminals.
title: Feyerverk
plot_es: During military exercise four cadets and their leader face a group of profiteers robbing battlefields of WWII. The profiteers capture their leader, the cadets go into action and neutralize the criminals.
plot_en: During military exercise four cadets and their leader face a group of profiteers robbing battlefields of WWII. The profiteers capture their leader, the cadets go into action and neutralize the criminals.
